title: Christmas from A to Z
description: For anyone interested in having a handy and attractive reference guide covering Christmas, New Year's, and related days of observance from around the world, this book includes more than 200 alphabetically arranged entries. It discusses folk and religious customs as well as the history, legends, and symbols associated with the holidays. The bookÂ is abundantly illustrated and features guides for further reading and an extensive, easy-to-use index.
author: Tanya Gulevich
